name: Alien8 3D
description:
This is a recreation of the classic ZX Spectrum game Alien 8, originally developed and published by Ultimate.

The aim of the game is to drop the 4 "plugs" into the 4 "sockets".  Once this is done you have completed the game.  Currently, only the first 11 or so rooms are implemented, but this is a self-contained game and can be completed.

If you have any problems or find any bugs, please let me know.  Also, any messages of encouragement are much appreciated!
